meanings.definition: The quality or state of being silly or foolish.
meanings.sent1: Her daffiness always brought smiles to everyone around.
meanings.sent2: His daffiness made the whole class burst into laughter.
meanings.sent3: The daffiness of the situation was so contagious that even the grumpiest person couldn't help but chuckle.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of seriousness, her daffiness was like a refreshing breeze.
meanings.sent5: The daffiness of the clown's performance left a lasting impression on the children.

meanings.definition: A silly or foolish act or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The children's daffiness during playtime was endearing to watch.
meanings.sent2: His daffiness often got him into amusing predicaments.
meanings.sent3: The daffiness of the puppy chasing its tail never failed to entertain the family.
meanings.sent4: Her daffiness in trying to juggle too many tasks at once was comical.
meanings.sent5: The daffiness of the comedian's jokes had the audience roaring with laughter.
